name: Wiza Monitor
tagline: Track job changes and get Slack + email alerts
description: Wiza Monitor is a job change tracking tool that lets you track customer and prospect job changes in real time, get alerts via email and Slack, and keep your CRM automatically updated.

name: TheLibrarian.io
tagline: Your WhatsApp AI Assistant
description: WhatsApp AI Assistant designed to Master Your Inbox, Control Your Schedule, Find Anything You Need - so you can focus on what truly matters. It seamlessly integrates with all your Google Apps (Gmail, Drive, Calendar, Contacts), Slack, and Notion.

name: Playbook
tagline: Beautiful documentation your customers will love
description: Playbook is a modern documentation platform that eliminates technical hurdles, making it easy to create, manage, and publish beautiful docs. Focus on writing great content while Playbook handles hosting, deployment, and infrastructure automatically.

name: Trueguard
tagline: Stop fake user signups
description: Trueguard delivers advanced protection against malicious users for your SaaS. Automatically blocking temporary emails, free-tier abusers, automated bots, and other threats.

name: Omniflow
tagline: The Operating System for modern product development
description: Omniflow is an AI-powered platform that helps teams turn ideas into production-ready software fast. Generate clear requirements, build prototypes in minutes, and transform them into high quality products through seamless team collaboration & automation.

name: Backed AI
tagline: Your Daily AI Companion for Back Pain & Posture Correction
description: Struggling with back pain or poor posture? Backed offers AI-powered posture screening, science-backed exercises to relieve pain & improve posture in just 5 mins a day. Say goodbye to discomfort with personalized, effective routines designed for daily use.

name: AdClone AI
tagline: Remix any ad in Linkedin's Ad Library
description: AdClone AI scrapes your site, pulls from a library of top‑performing LinkedIn ads, and uses GPT image gen to spin brand‑perfect creatives in 30  seconds. Skip designers, guesswork & high CPC. It's time to hack your CAC before your competitors catch up.

name: Artefact
tagline: Smarter Docs for Faster Teams
description: Artefact is the smarter way to create, collaborate, and get documents approved. With CRM-style tracking, built-in accountability, and AI-powered insights, we help teams replace document chaos with clarity — so you can ship work faster.

name: OpenAI Codex CLI
tagline: Frontier reasoning in the terminal
description: For developers who live in the terminal and want ChatGPT‑level reasoning plus the power to actually run code, manipulate files, and iterate – all under version control. In short, it’s chat‑driven development that understands and executes your repo.

name: Music AI Bubble
tagline: Connect ChatGPT to your music app for music trivia & info
description: Music AI elevates your music listening experience with behind-the-song trivia. - Detects the currently playing song on your phone. - A floating bubble overlays instant insights about the song. - Works with Spotify, Apple Music, TIDAL or any music app!

name: Veo 2 in Gemini
tagline: Google's Cinematic Video AI, Now Integrated
description: Generate high-quality, 8-sec AI videos from text with Veo 2, now available in Gemini Advanced (Google One AI Premium required). Cinematic realism.

name: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini
tagline: Advanced Visual Reasoning & Agentic Tool Use
description: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini are reasoning models that think with images & agentically use tools (Search, Code, DALL-E). SOTA multimodal performance. Available in ChatGPT & API.

name: Pit Stop
tagline: App for following the F1 racing season with live circuit
description: Pit Stop shows live timings, upcoming race countdowns, weekend schedules, track maps, and standings — all in one simple app designed for Formula 1 fans.

name: Tablextract
tagline: Extract tables from anything.
description: Extract tables from anything - PDF, PNG, JPG, screenshot, live photos you name it. Save yourself hours of manual data entry, extract tables with us in less than 3 clicks and export them directly into Excel, CSV or just copy them to your clipboard!

name: Introducing Mirage™ Edit by Captions
tagline: Instantly turn your prompt into a fully-edited talking video
description: Today, we're launching Mirage Edit — a first of its kind AI tool that lets anyone go from a text prompt to a fully-edited talking video, featuring actors that don’t exist.

name: Heatbot.io 2.0
tagline: Generate improved websites from heatmaps with AI
description: Heatbot is a data-driven generative UI builder. Upload user analysis heatmaps and let AI generate improved websites in seconds. Heatbot will be your UX agency in one tool.

name: CursorFlow
tagline: Visualize your cursor tracks and keystrokes on macOS
description: Elevate your Mac screen shares! CursorFlow adds customizable visual trails to your mouse, highlights clicks with effects & sound, and displays keystrokes clearly. Ideal for demos, tutorials, and collaborative sessions. Make your interactions visible!

name: Wisbox.ai
tagline: Draw on screen, get instant AI guidance in any Mac app
description: Tired of wasting hours on tutorials for one specific step? wisbox.ai is your macOS co-pilot to conquer complex apps (Blender/PS). Get instant, visual AI help based on your screen context. Finish tasks, not tutorials!

name: Reelmind
tagline: Open source AI video models community.
description: ReelMind is an Open Source AI Video Models Community. Here you can train and share your own video model base on open source video model.

name: CodeBeaver
tagline: Unit tests on autopilot
description: Put Unit Tests on autopilot. CodeBeaver analyzes your codebase, writes unit tests, runs them, and gives you a PR with the tests. Stop spending hours on test coverage. Start shipping features. Works with Github, GitLab, and Bitbucket
